structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Waste committed while action pending -- Receiver -- Injunction.
law.text: If the tenant or person in possession of any land commits or is about to commit any waste thereon, pending an action to recover or charge such land, the court in which the action is pending may order a receiver to take possession of the land, or may stay the committing of waste by injunction or restraining order.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2336.
